blogPost.excerpt: Easyclout is a powerful, simple, all-in-one social media management and growth platform that helps businesses reduce social media marketing costs with our state of the art AI bot. Saving you time, increase productivity, and achieve better business results.
blogPost.body: Easyclout is a powerful, simple, all-in-one social media management and growth platform that helps businesses reduce social media marketing costs with our state of the art AI bot. Saving you time, increase productivity, and achieve better business results.
blogPost.title: EasyClout - Social media management and growth platform
blogPost.author: Bill Hinostroza

localize.description: Eascleout是一个强大、简单、一体式的社交媒体管理和增长平台，通过我们最先进的AI机器人帮助企业降低社交媒体营销成本。为您节省时间、提高工作效率并取得更好的业务成果。
localize.tagline: 社交媒体管理和增长平台

localize.description: Eascleout是一個強大、簡單、一體式的社交媒體管理和增長平臺，通過我們最先進的AI機器人幫助企業降低社交媒體營銷成本。爲您節省時間、提高工作效率並取得更好的業務成果。
localize.tagline: 社交媒體管理和增長平臺

previous.excerpt: Ship faster and improve team satisfaction with engineering analytics powered by your Github data. -- → Visualize the entire delivery process from commit to deploy → Highlight bottlenecks like code review → Spot issues like feature delays and team burnout.
previous.title: Haystack - Ship faster and improve dev happiness

localize.description: 借助由您的Github数据提供支持的工程分析，加快发货速度并提高团队满意度。--→可视化整个交付过程，从提交到部署，→突出瓶颈(如代码审查)，→发现问题(如功能延迟和团队倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快发货速度，提高开发人员幸福感

localize.description: 藉助由您的Github數據提供支持的工程分析，加快發貨速度並提高團隊滿意度。--→可視化整個交付過程，從提交到部署，→突出瓶頸(如代碼審查)，→發現問題(如功能延遲和團隊倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快發貨速度，提高開發人員幸福感

next.excerpt: Tails is the ultimate TailwindCSS Page Creator. Need a website for your next great idea? Tails is the perfect tool to creating a beautiful landing page. Over 120 design blocks you can mix and match to craft the perfect landing page for your next project.
next.title: Tails - The ultimate TailwindCSS drag'n drop page creator

localize.description: Tails是终极TailwinCSS页面创建器。需要一个网站来展示你的下一个好点子吗？Tails是创建漂亮登录页面的完美工具。超过120个设计模块，您可以混合搭配，为您的下一个项目制作完美的登录页。
Tails是終極TailwinCSS頁面創建器。需要一個網站來展示你的下一個好點子嗎？Tails是創建漂亮登錄頁面的完美工具。超過120個設計模塊，您可以混合搭配，爲您的下一個項目製作完美的登錄頁。
